dev.eternalformula.api.input

Interface InputHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameInputHandler, UIInputHandler

    public interface InputHandler
    The InputHandler interface acts as a template for handling various input events. If the InputHandler is added to the InputListener, its methods will be called whenever the InputListener receives input.
    Since:
    Alpha 0.0.3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int UI_HANDLER
      Handler type.

      Handler type.

      Handles when the mouse wheel is scrolled.
      void setBlocked(boolean isBlocked)
      Dictates whether the input handler should ignore the inputs received from the InputListener.

    • Field Detail

      • WORLD_HANDLER

        static final int WORLD_HANDLER
        Handler type. The WORLD_HANDLER type causes all screen coordinates to be converted to world coordinates.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UI_HANDLER

        static final int UI_HANDLER
        Handler type. The UI_HANDLER type causes all screen coordinates to be converted to UI coordinates.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • onMouseWheelScrolled

        void onMouseWheelScrolled(int direction)
        Handles when the mouse wheel is scrolled.
        Parameters:
        direction - 1 if the mouse wheel is being scrolled down, -1 if it is being scrolled up.

      • getHandlerType

        int getHandlerType()

      • isBlocked

        boolean isBlocked()
        Returns whether the input handler is blocked.

      • setBlocked

        void setBlocked(boolean isBlocked)
        Dictates whether the input handler should ignore the inputs received from the InputListener.
